Come out to our November event to hear talks from three great R Ladies!

This meeting will highlight local Baltimore R-Ladies analyzing data in industry. It will include presentations from three speakers to discuss how they use R in their jobs and examples of projects they work on!

Visit our [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-baltimore/events/254235117/) page for more details and to RSVP.
